body.name: Mini Projector,HY300 Portable Projector,4K/200 ANSI Projector with 2.4/5G WiFi and Bluetooth.Auto Keystone Correction,40"-130" Screen,180° Flip,Android 11.0,Round Design Movie Projector (White)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 21 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 3 hrs 21 mins
features: 🎬【Mini Portable Projector】This Mini Portable Projector features unique exterior desgin and Hi-chip A3100. Equipped with 1GB+8GB ROM storage, it can stream movies, shows, live sports and music from your phone or laptop. The size of Mini Portable Projector is 10.08 x 10.35 cm and the net weight of 500 grams, it is perfect for carrying.

🎬【2.4/5G WiFi & BT 5.0 Video Projector】This 5g wifi bluetooth projector equipped with latest 5G dual band WiFi, with higher transmission rate and lower latency, a few seconds will be wirelessly synchronized to get a big screen. This means you can easily connect to your phone, tablet, or other devices to cast your screen. Whether you're streaming a movie or sharing a photo.

🎬【Movie Projector】This portable projector with a stand that rotates 180 degrees, you can position your image from floor to ceiling where you want it. The Freestyle gives you the flexibility to view your favorite images on the large 130-inch screen. Versatile and portable, it's an excellent choice for family entertainment and outdoor camping.

🎬【Auto Keystone Correction & Low Noise】This smart projector adapted manual focus and auto keystone correction technology, built-in high-precision sensor, detects real-time movement and focuses faster and more accurately. Please use manual focus after the projector boots up and can automatically correct the image up and down.the left and right cannot adjusted. This mini projector workes lower noise to 25 dB, ensure an impressive sound environment.

🎬【Multifunctional Home Theater Projector 】This movie projector with 1280*720 native resolution, 10000:1 high dynamic contrast ratio, and support Full HD 4K videos decord. This mini projector also has 50% zoom function. Equipped with multiple ports, which can be easily connected to DVD, smartphones, tablets, HDMI-enabled devices, speakers, etc. (Built-in 3W*1 HiFi speakers)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HY300 5G Wifi Bluetooth Projector 4k Main Features for the HY300 Proejctor: 5G + 2.4G WiFi BT 5.0 Support 4K 130-inch screen Auto Keystone Correction 180° Rotation 3W Hi-Fi Speaker Portable Size 50-100% Zoom Wired Screen(iOS connect by Cables) 1. Connect your iPhone to the projector via the original iPhone charging cable. (Cable has a USB port and Lighting Port) 2. Please click "Trust" when the iPhone shows a pop-up window and enter device password. Wireless Screen (The Android Mobile/ Pad must be on the same network as the projector device.) 1. Open the settings menu on your Android Mobile/Pad. 2. Access your display settings or screen mirroring. 3. Select the device name. DLNA(The phone/Pad must be on the same network as the projector device.) 1. Open the video playing app. 2. Click the TV icon and select the device name. iOS Cast(Connect with iOS Phone via screen mirroring) 1. Open WIFI and find the device name from your phone. Then input the password on your phone. 2. Click Airplay/Screen mirroring on your phone and connect the projector.

Dual Band WiFi 5G/2.4G Enjoy your favorite movies, music and games on the larger screen in just seconds. High speeds of up to 1500 Mbps for lag-free gaming and smooth HD streaming. Higher speed, lower latency, larger capacity, more secure network. Dual-band Wi-Fi (2.4GHz/5.8GHz) for seamless mobile and tablet connectivity.

130 Inch Projection Screen Adjustable projection screen size, maximum adjustable to 130 inch screens (1.68 meters optimal projection distance) 180° Rotatable Mit diesem vielseitigen Projektor ist das ganz einfach: Mit dem um 180 Grad drehbaren Ständer können Sie das Bild überall vom Boden bis zur Decke platzieren und haben so die Flexibilität, Videos abzuspielen. Automatic Keystone Correction HY300 mini projector features manual focus and automatic keystone correction technology, built-in high-precision sensor, detects movement in real time and focuses faster and more accurately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cumplió con las expectativas!!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Solo le di 4 Stars porque le hace falta un conector AV, un conector para una power bank y lector de SD card que No la tiene, pero la proyección en un dia nublado y la opción que puedo proyectar desde varios angulos es expectacular!! (proyecto al techo :) :) ) me siento a gusto con la inversión, lo puedo llevar fácilmente y la conexión a internet muy buena, (amazon, netflix, otras app de streaming) solo se puede decir que no muy a gusto, cuando se proyecta desde el celular con el miracast algunas veces se desconecta pero de pendiendo del celular se puede reproducir solo con el wifi sin internet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Shipping was a bit faster than the original expected date. We love the picture quality and additional apps you can download on the device. It is a very easy set up and you have options to expand screen if needed.

The media could not be loaded. Llego un día antes de lo programado ✅Calidad de imagen excelente ✅Bocina integrada y salida de audio 3.5 mm ✅ aunque me hubiera gustado que se pudiera vía BluetoothEn el video estoy transmitiendo de YouTube, muy buena resolución ✅Lo puse del piso al techo y se ve como una pantalla de 80"✅Intente transmitir Netflix desde el celular pero no me permitió ❌En general muy satisfecho con la compra. Si lo recomiendo 💯
